001.headline: Free food for everyone!
001.lead: The popular millionaire Andy Montana offers charity banquets in the poorest areas of the city.

002.headline: The strike continues on Soup & Pastas
002.lead: Third day of strike, estimated losses for 100 dollars.

003.headline: Annette Gray will sing at the South Hall
003.lead: The famous singer will perform this May 5th with the band Underground Boys.

004.headline: Ernest Jones the 5th race for veterans
004.lead: The city is preparing for the event that will raise funds for veterans of the Great War.

005.headline: Marta Robinson's store house was robbed
005.lead: Yesterday around 200 dollars in merchandise were stolen from the popular store.
